channel.title: HighScores help

item.title: HighScores help
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Okay first problem is i followed this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=364364.0
i did everything
replaced LOCALHOST with my ip address 192.168.1.103 then i put the com and stuff needed to my server folderâ€¦ and compiled but then when i ask my friend to go to the *************.no-ip.org <- my server name it just white site

Second problem:
and then i putted the
SQL.createConnection();
SQL.saveHighScore(this);
SQL.destroyConnection();
at the logout update
so my code now looks like this
public void logout() {
SQL.createConnection();
SQL.saveHighScore(this);
SQL.destroyConnection();
try {
killMyNPCs();
if(inPitsGame){
inPitsGame = false;
PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!");
}
and then i compiled no errors but i dont go to the highscores when i logout WHY?? Please help me

Read full topic
